description: From Latin annihilābilis, from annihilō. Equivalent to annihilate +‎ -able.

adjectives.description: annihilable (comparative more annihilable, superlative most annihilable)

entries.meaning: Able to be destroyed completely; capable of being annihilated.
examples: […]  it cannot be a created substance; because we cannot conceive it creable or annihilable  […]
